backend/main.mo: Internet Computer canister actor that includes the MixinStorage module to provide blob storage functionality.
feature_evidence.json: Machine-readable report mapping implemented landing page features to frontend files, components, and test requirements with confidence metadata.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: Prewritten JSON-style summaries describing the purpose of each frontend source file and component.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS setup defining design tokens, color variables, and light/dark theme styles for the application.
frontend/index.html: HTML entry point that mounts the React app and sets basic metadata and page title.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that assembles all landing page sections in the required order.
frontend/src/components/Contact.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/FinalCta.tsx: Final call-to-action section displaying a headline, price, and prominent WhatsApp contact button.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Footer section showing a disclaimer and WhatsApp contact number.
frontend/src/components/Gallery.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/Hero.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/LandingHero.tsx: Hero section with background image, ebook cover, main headline, subheading, and WhatsApp purchase CTA.
frontend/src/components/ProductPreview.t: Product preview section showing the ebook image, ₹199 price, short description, and WhatsApp buy button.
frontend/src/components/Reviews.tsx: Social proof section rendering three static customer reviews in card layout with star icons.
frontend/src/components/Services.tsx: Empty placeholder file with no implementation.
frontend/src/components/WhyChooseGuide.t: Section listing key benefits of the guide using checkmark icons and a structured, mobile-friendly layout.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom React hook that creates and manages an authenticated or anonymous Internet Computer actor using React Query and identity state.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Defines a React context, provider, and hook for Internet Identity authentication, handling login/logout, identity persistence, delegation validation, and detailed login status flags using Dfinity AuthClient.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Placeholder module exporting nothing, indicating no backend data fetching is required for this static site.
frontend/src/index.css: Tailwind CSS entry file that defines base styles, CSS variable-driven color themes for light and dark modes, and small utility extensions.
frontend/src/lib/whatsapp.ts: Exports a constant prefilled WhatsApp chat link used as a purchase or contact CTA.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that renders the React app, wrapping it with React Query and Internet Identity providers and loading global styles.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Configures Tailwind CSS with dark mode, content paths, CSS-variable-based color tokens, layout defaults, animations, and typography/container-query plugins.
project_state.json: Machine-readable snapshot of the project’s current purpose and implemented features, describing a single-page WhatsApp-driven ebook sales landing page and its functional components.
